reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I don't drive every day, but vehicle battery still drained cause CD player keeps CD in memory start spot. I had to replace 2 batteries before got this, I also use to plug battery into charger always. Now with this it's easy and quick to turn off battery just by turning the nob on or off!!!!! No more battery frequent replacement

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for parasitic draw on my zero turn mower. Had to do some minor tinkering to get it to work with my flat battery posts on this smaller 12v but that has nothing to do with the product itself it's not made for this. When I did get it set up it's actually really easy to use and works as advertised. I did check multiple times with my digital multimeter to make sure there was no voltage or current and there was nothing. I put up with years of self-inflicted misery having to charge the battery every single time I wanted to start the mower. This is 100% the mower's fault and not bad batteries. No more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Will it work for my application?
reviews.reviewText: The problem I had with the first order was that it didn't have all the parts. I tried this one out and found that I had to order a box of brass washers (only needed one) to make up space for unit to sit level on the side of the battery. I feel that it was an engineering mistake in design in the shape of the brass terminal so I didn't give it a perfect score of 5.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to install. Only drive my vehicle when hauling; keeps my battery from draining while not being used for long periods of time. Should have installed this months ago; would have saved me from having to charge my battery.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars You got one shot
reviews.reviewText: Metal is weak and the threads were messed up within an hour of working. Do it right because if you don’t, the threads won’t hold up. I accidentally cross threaded one of the bolts. It didn’t even take that much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars solid, easy to install
reviews.reviewText: These are a great value. They are a simple design made with sturdy materials. I got one for my truck and one for my camper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Poor design, not reliable
reviews.reviewText: Fits properly on battery, but the contacts do not disengage reliably. Any movement could cause them to make contact unexpectedly. It is not a switch as claimed, but more like loosening a wire. The knob holds the contacts securely together when in the ON position. However The contact points are NOT held apart when knob is loosened. They just flop around and good luck with that!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Exact fit for GM side terminal battery.

reviews.reviewerName: Juan Pedro Pérez LópezJuan Pedro Pérez López
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Buen producto y para cuando dejas por muchos días sin uso tu camioneta, es excelente.
Exactly what I needed, easy to use and it works great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted this device to isolate the battery on my Classic American car, hence the need for a side post fitting. Bought another one,great product.
